2072.subject: MPA
2072.descrlong: Covers advanced mixing and mastering techniques. Effects processing, signal compression, mastering tools, and preparation for final mix-down. Application of CD-R burning, duplication, and distribution channels for final projects. Study of high-resolution audio for DVD-A and SACD. Integration of surround sound techniques and application for missing in 5.1 and beyond. Industry standard protocols for music business; current standards for copyright, and royalty considerations. Special projects in experimental audio. (Offered spring semester.)
